text: She Wanted a Millionaire is a 1932 American romantic drama movie directed by John G. Blystone and starring Joan Bennett, Spencer Tracy, Una Merkel, James Kirkwood, Dorothy Peterson, Don Dillaway. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * She Wanted a Millionaire at Internet Movie Database * Category:1932 romance movies Category:1932 drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by John G. Blystone
title: She Wanted a Millionaire
